personalData.title: Personal Data Processing Cards
personalData.description: In this section, you can view and edit cards that show personal data collection and storage activities carried out by your unit.

suppliers.title: Supplier Cards
suppliers.description: In this section, you can view and edit cards that show suppliers from which your unit receives services and the personal data accessed by these suppliers.

publicTransfers.title: Public Transfers
publicTransfers.description: In this section, you can view and edit cards that show personal data transferred by your unit to public institutions.

otherTransfers.title: Other Transfers
otherTransfers.description: In this section, you can view and edit cards that show personal data transferred to individuals and organizations other than suppliers and public institutions.
